title: Under the Amalfi Sun
writer: Caterina Salvadori, Enrico Vanzina, Ciro Zecca
short_cast: Lorenzo Zurzolo, Ludovica Martino, Davide Calgaro, Isabella Ferrari, Luca Ward, Kyshan Wilson, Nicolas Maupas, Andrea Occhipinti, Elena Funari, Marit Nissen, Raz Degan
cast: Lorenzo Zurzolo, Ludovica Martino, Davide Calgaro, Isabella Ferrari, Luca Ward, Kyshan Wilson, Nicolas Maupas, Andrea Occhipinti, Elena Funari, Marit Nissen, Raz Degan

desc: A year after their romance began in Riccione, Vincenzo and Camilla reunite for a vacation on the picturesque Amalfi Coast and put their love to the test.
